content.text: I've been feeling a little down lately, but I'm trying to stay positive.
What's wrong? I'm here to listen.
It's just a lot of things. I'm not sure how to tell my parents that I've been seeing a therapist, but I know it's something I need to do.
That's a big step, I'm proud of you. I know it can be hard to talk about things like that, but it's important to be honest with your family.
I know, but I'm just not sure how they'll react. I'm afraid they'll think I'm crazy or something.
I don't think they'll think that at all. They love you and they want what's best for you. They'll be happy that you're getting help.
I hope you're right. I'm just scared.
That's understandable. But don't let that stop you from doing what you need to do.
Thanks for talking to me. It really helps.
You're welcome. I'm here for you if you need anything.
